Attackdex

Name Type Category PP Power Accuracy Description
Anchor Shot 20 80 100 The user entangles the target with its anchor chain. It becomes unable to flee.
Autotomize 15 — — The user sheds part of its body to make itself lighter and sharply raise its Speed stat.
Behemoth Bash 5 100 100 The user becomes a gigantic shield that deals double damage to infused targets.
Behemoth Blade 5 100 100 The user becomes a gigantic sword that deals double damage to energy-infused targets.
Bullet Punch 30 40 100 The target is struck by tough punches as fast as bullets. This move always goes first.
Doom Desire 5 140 100 Two turns after this move is used, a concentrated bundle of light blasts the target.
Double Iron Bash 5 60 100 The user strikes with its arms twice in a row. This may also make the target flinch.
Flash Cannon 10 80 100 The user gathers all its light energy and fires it. It may also lower the target's Sp. Def stat.
Gear Grind 15 50 85 The user attacks by throwing steel gears at its target twice.
Gear Up 20 — — Ally Pokémon with the Plus or Minus Ability have their offensive stats raised.
Gigaton Hammer 5 160 100 The user swings its body like a hammer. It can't be used twice in a row.
Gird 20 — 100 The user fastens itself to restore its HP but can no longer switch out.
Gyro Ball 5 — 100 The user tackles the target with a high-speed spin. The slower the user, the better.
Hard Press 10 — 100 Crushes the target with a heavy appendage. This move's power scales with the target's HP.
Heavy Slam 10 — 100 The user slams into the target with its body. The move's power scales with the user's weight.
Iron Defense 15 — — The user hardens its body's surface like iron, sharply raising its Defense stat.
Iron Head 15 80 100 The user slams the target with its steel-hard head. This may also make the target flinch.
Iron Tail 15 100 75 The target is slammed with a steel-hard tail. This may also lower its Defense stat.
Joust 10 — 100 The user charges at the target with a lance. The move's power scales with the user's Speed.
King's Shield 10 — — The user protects itself from damage and lowers the Attack stat of those making contact.
Magnet Bomb 20 60 — The user launches steel bombs that stick to the target. This attack never misses.
Make It Rain 5 120 100 Throws a mass of coins, lowering its Sp. Atk. Money is earned after the battle.
Metal Burst 10 — 100 The user retaliates with greater force against the opponent that last damaged it.
Metal Claw 35 50 95 The target is raked with steel claws. This may also raise the user's Attack stat.
Metal Sound 40 — 85 A horrible sound like scraping metal harshly lowers the target's Sp. Def stat.
Meteor Mash 10 90 90 The user hits the target with a punch fired like a meteor. This may also raise its Attack stat.
Mirror Shot 10 65 85 The user fires a flash of energy from its polished body. It may also lower a target's accuracy.
Raptor Wreck 15 120 100 The user furiously batters the target, but is damaged quite a lot.
Shelter 10 0 — The user makes its skin as hard as an iron shield to sharply boost Defense.
Shift Gear 10 — — The user rotates its gears, raising its Attack stat and sharply raising its Speed stat.
Shrapnel Sear 5 110 75 The user blasts the target with molten scrap metal. This may leave it with a burn.
Shrapnel Terrain 10 — — For 5 turns, grounded Pokémon take recoil damage and Steel type-moves are stronger.
Smart Strike 10 70 — The user stabs the target with a sharp horn. This attack never misses.
Spin Out 5 100 100 The user spins furiously to damage the target. It harshly lower's the user's Speed.
Steel Beam 5 140 95 The user fires a beam of steel from its entire body. This also damages the user.
Steel Roller 5 130 100 The user attacks while destroying the terrain, but fails if there isn't any.
Steel Wing 25 70 90 The target is hit with wings of steel. This may also raise the user's Defense stat.
Sunsteel Strike 5 100 100 The user slams into the target with the force of a meteor, ignoring its Abilities.
Tachyon Cutter 10 50 — Launches particle blades to inflict damage. It hits twice, and never misses.
Tinker 15 — 100 The user tinkers. This raises four random stats, but also lowers two other stats.
